meta.title: 饿龙不是龙哩
meta.description: 世界太吵，寻一处僻静乐土|冼仙´blog|命里缺水|专业腹诽|记录|分享|碎碎念|热爱一切美好...
meta.author: 青菜芋子

pages.title: about
pages.text: var binft = function (r) { function t() { return b[Math.floor(Math.random() * b.length)] } function e() { return String.fromCharCode(94 * Math.random() + 33) } function n(r) { for (var n = document.createDocumentFragment(), i = 0; r > i; i++) { var l = document.createElement("span"); l.textContent = e(), l.style.color = t(), n.appendChild(l) } return n } function i() { var t = o[c.skillI]; c.step ? c.step-- : (c.step = g, c.prefixP < l.length ? (c.prefixP >= 0 && (c.text += l[c.prefixP]), c.prefixP++) : "forward" === c.direction ? c.skillP < t.length ? (c.text += t[c.skillP], c.skillP++) : c.delay ? c.delay-- : (c.direction = "backward", c.delay = a) : c.skillP > 0 ? (c.text = c.text.slice(0, -1), c.skillP--) : (c.skillI = (c.skillI + 1) % o.length, c.direction = "forward")), r.textContent = c.text, r.appendChild(n(c.prefixP < l.length ? Math.min(s, s + c.prefixP) : Math.min(s, t.length - c.skillP))), setTimeout(i, d) } var l = "", o = ["行行重行行，与君生别离。", "相去万余里，各在天一涯。","道路阻且长，会面安可知？", "胡马依北风，越鸟巢南枝。","相去日已远，衣带日已缓。","浮云蔽白日，游子不顾反。","思君令人老，岁月忽已晚。","弃捐勿复道，努力加餐饭。"].map(function (r) { return r + "" }), a = 2, g = 1, s = 5, d = 75, b = ["rgb(110,64,170)", "rgb(150,61,179)", "rgb(191,60,175)", "rgb(228,65,157)", "rgb(254,75,131)", "rgb(255,94,99)", "rgb(255,120,71)", "rgb(251,150,51)", "rgb(226,183,47)", "rgb(198,214,60)", "rgb(175,240,91)", "rgb(127,246,88)", "rgb(82,246,103)", "rgb(48,239,130)", "rgb(29,223,163)", "rgb(26,199,194)", "rgb(35,171,216)", "rgb(54,140,225)", "rgb(76,110,219)", "rgb(96,84,200)"], c = { text: "", prefixP: -s, skillI: 0, skillP: 0, direction: "forward", delay: a, step: g }; i() }; binft(document.getElementById('binft')); 2020.09.09由于chrome闪屏bug，不得不更新Fluid主题。部分精心调整的美化效果丢失，再加回来又有动画过渡时间不生效的问题，弃疗。放弃使用 Artitalk.js，没啥意思。 2020.07.16Valine评论系统坏了。 2020.07.11最近主要折腾副站 loafing.cn，这边的缓存周期延长至一天。学会插入赞赏码。 2020.06.29本站 JS、CSS 静态资源的URL前缀全部自定义成 jsdelivr CDN 地址，希望别翻车。 2020.06.27引入Artitalk.js，现在可以实时发布说说，与原来的微博页合并（勉强）。 2020.06.25新建一个微博页重新启用aplayer，速度没啥影响 2020.06.16不刻意非得找刘亦菲的照片做文章封面了，累🤦‍♂️ 2020.05.31更新Fluid主题至1.8.1-beta2，速度更快使用leancloud替换不蒜子计数，提升稳定性，之前好不容易攒的几千访问量没了（哭） 2020.05.25熬夜配置夜间模式并优化配色🌚🌕新增PWA支持，增强体验，超快的页面浏览速度欢迎使用Chrome点击右上角菜单-添加到主屏幕留言板本地预览没问题，可上线之后加载不出评论框架，弃疗🙄新建一个相册页放茜茜的精选照片终于用上jsDelivr 2020.05.23地址栏旁边的标志变红🤷‍♂️放弃治疗，关闭aplayer，花里胡哨，徒增加载项，感兴趣的可以去友链页面瞅瞅我的网盘分享关闭背景动态线条小绿锁回来了在底部添加几个图标，🍻是赞赏码开启强制https（我也不知道实际上有多大用处😶） 2020.05.21开启aplayer，且支持自动吸底，对手机浏览更友好。没找到pjax教程，切换页面将重新加载歌曲。地址栏旁边的小绿锁没了，不舒服🤦‍♂️ 2020.05.19🎉本站已启用Cloudflare CDN加速，国内大多数地区访问速度均有提升谷歌统计和百度统计正常使用Coding恢复正常新建了一个留言板 2020.05.17本站成功收录至Google搜索，已添加站点地图，今后可直接使用谷歌搜索出本站内容（继续吐槽百度，迟迟不成功）举例：搜索本站“教程”昨天Coding那边好像出了问题，脑阔疼，先暂停对其域名和ip的解析吧，GitHub又不是不能用🙄本站支持RSS订阅，若不嫌弃可以点这里添加试试。明天18号开学，愿一切顺利🙏 2020.04.18折腾一个多礼拜的WordPress，主题丰富、工具强大。可惜仅限于局域网自娱自乐，免费的内网穿透速度极其缓慢且不稳定，无法真正投入使用，弃之。继续找教程搭建Typecho，比WP精简得多，主题大多小清新向。体验半天感觉玩法太少，教程偏老，官方好几年不更新，担心遇到问题搜索不到有效的解决方案，体验半天及时弃坑。最终遇到Hexo，总算收住这颗瞎折腾的心，安稳使用静态页面。GitHub和Coding双线部署，免备案免服务器，访问基本流畅，白嫖万岁。装载Fluid主题，Material Design使用Valine评论系统，方便交流沟通，为孤零零的博客增添一丝生气👍 2020.04.14获得人生中第一个域名liuyifei.club 应该不会侵犯名誉权吧，如有冒犯请茜姐本人或经纪人联系在下，上面有邮箱🧐

pages.title: 相册
pages.text: 北方有佳人 绝世而独立 陌上人如玉 公子世无双 巧笑倩兮 / 美目盼兮 / 素以为绚兮 var binft = function (r) { function t() { return b[Math.floor(Math.random() * b.length)] } function e() { return String.fromCharCode(94 * Math.random() + 33) } function n(r) { for (var n = document.createDocumentFragment(), i = 0; r > i; i++) { var l = document.createElement("span"); l.textContent = e(), l.style.color = t(), n.appendChild(l) } return n } function i() { var t = o[c.skillI]; c.step ? c.step-- : (c.step = g, c.prefixP < l.length ? (c.prefixP >= 0 && (c.text += l[c.prefixP]), c.prefixP++) : "forward" === c.direction ? c.skillP < t.length ? (c.text += t[c.skillP], c.skillP++) : c.delay ? c.delay-- : (c.direction = "backward", c.delay = a) : c.skillP > 0 ? (c.text = c.text.slice(0, -1), c.skillP--) : (c.skillI = (c.skillI + 1) % o.length, c.direction = "forward")), r.textContent = c.text, r.appendChild(n(c.prefixP < l.length ? Math.min(s, s + c.prefixP) : Math.min(s, t.length - c.skillP))), setTimeout(i, d) } var l = "", o = ["愿在衣而为领 承华首之余芳", "愿在裳而为带 束窈窕之纤身","愿在发而为泽 刷玄鬓于颓肩", "愿在眉而为黛 随瞻视以闲扬","愿在莞而为席 安弱体于三秋","愿在丝而为履 附素足以周旋","愿在昼而为影 常依形而西东","愿在夜而为烛 照玉容于两楹","愿在竹而为扇 含凄飙于柔握","愿在木而为桐 作膝上之鸣琴"].map(function (r) { return r + "" }), a = 2, g = 1, s = 5, d = 75, b = ["rgb(110,64,170)", "rgb(150,61,179)", "rgb(191,60,175)", "rgb(228,65,157)", "rgb(254,75,131)", "rgb(255,94,99)", "rgb(255,120,71)", "rgb(251,150,51)", "rgb(226,183,47)", "rgb(198,214,60)", "rgb(175,240,91)", "rgb(127,246,88)", "rgb(82,246,103)", "rgb(48,239,130)", "rgb(29,223,163)", "rgb(26,199,194)", "rgb(35,171,216)", "rgb(54,140,225)", "rgb(76,110,219)", "rgb(96,84,200)"], c = { text: "", prefixP: -s, skillI: 0, skillP: 0, direction: "forward", delay: a, step: g }; i() }; binft(document.getElementById('binft'));

auto;width:500px}}.center{position:absolute;top:50%;left:50%;-webkit-transform:translate(-50%,-50%)}.postcard{width:450px;height:250px;background-color:#fff;background:linear-gradient(#f8f8f8,#fff);box-shadow:0 8px 16px -8px rgba(0,0,0,.4);border-radius:6px;overflow:hidden;position:relative;margin:1.5rem;transform:scale(1)}.postcard h1{text-align:center}.postcard .additional{position:absolute;width:150px;height:100%;background:linear-gradient(#de685e,#ee786e);transition:width .4s;overflow:hidden;z-index:1000}.postcard.green .additional{background:linear-gradient(#2492a5,#a2ccb6)}.postcard.pink_blue .additional{background:linear-gradient(#f5636f,#2492a5)}.postcard:hover .additional{width:100%;border-radius:0 5px 5px 0}.postcard .additional .user-card{width:150px;height:100%;position:relative;float:left}.postcard .additional .user-card::after{content:"";display:block;position:absolute;top:10%;right:-2px;height:80%;border-left:2px solid rgba(0,0,0,.025)}.postcard .additional .user-card .level,.postcard .additional .user-card .points{top:15%;color:#fff;text-transform:uppercase;font-size:.75em;font-weight:700;background:rgba(0,0,0,.15);padding:.125rem .75rem;border-radius:100px;white-space:nowrap}.postcard .additional .user-card .points{top:85%}.postcard .additional .user-card svg{top:50%}.postcard .additional .more-info{width:300px;float:left;position:absolute;left:150px;height:100%}.postcard .additional .more-info h1{color:#fff;margin-bottom:0}.postcard.green .additional .more-info h1{color:#224c36}.postcard .additional .coords{margin:0 1rem;color:#fff;font-size:1rem}.postcard.green .additional .coords{color:#325c46}.postcard .additional .coords span+span{float:right}.postcard .additional .stats{font-size:2rem;display:flex;position:absolute;bottom:1rem;left:1rem;right:1rem;top:auto;color:#fff}.postcard.green .additional .stats{color:#325c46}.postcard .additional .stats>div{flex:1;text-align:center}.postcard .additional .stats i{display:block}.postcard .additional .stats div.title{font-size:.75rem;font-weight:700;text-transform:uppercase}.postcard .additional .stats div.value{font-size:1.5rem;font-weight:700;line-height:1.5rem}.postcard .additional .stats div.value.infinity{font-size:2.5rem}.postcard .general{width:300px;height:100%;position:absolute;top:0;right:0;z-index:1;box-sizing:border-box;padding:1rem;padding-top:0}.postcard .general .more{position:absolute;bottom:1rem;right:1rem;font-size:.9em}.intro-avatar img{border-radius:100px;box-shadow:rgba(0,0,0,.16) 0 2px 5px 0,rgba(0,0,0,.12) 0 2px 10px 0} /* rebuild by neat */

var OriginTitle = document.title; var titleTime; document.addEventListener('visibilitychange', function () { if (document.hidden) { $('[rel="icon"]').attr('href', "/img/favicon.png"); document.title = '崩溃啦╭(°A°`)╮'; clearTimeout(titleTime); } else { $('[rel="icon"]').attr('href', "/img/favicon.png"); document.title = '噫又好啦(ฅ>ω<*ฅ)' + OriginTitle; titleTime = setTimeout(function () { document.title = OriginTitle; }, 2000); } });

pages.title: miss
pages.text: 那些……的时候 下小雨的时候…烫伤嘴吃粉色差筷子围巾腰带半入耳/平头/蓝牙耳机Oppo A53小米手环/小米运动写自己的名字电影、书籍、歌曲手冷夜间模式坐火车手机没电做梦柔软
